Source code for utils.validate_password

"""validate_password.py"""

import re

EMAIL_REGEX = r"^[a-z0-9!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+(?:\.[a-z0-9!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+)*@(?:[a-z0-9](?:[a-z0-9-]*[a-z0-9])?\.)+[a-z0-9](?:[a-z0-9-]*[a-z0-9])?$"



[docs]
def is_valid_email(email):
    return re.match(EMAIL_REGEX, email)
